headline: 3 Reasons to Sell MMM and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: 3M currently trades at $158.55 per share and has shown little upside over the past six months, posting a middling return of 3.5%. The stock also fell short of the S&P 500’s 16.4% gain during that period.
